A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I really didn't like this film. 

The first hour meanders along with less story than a Smurfs film and a lot less charm. 

Then we find that the film disparages on the laws of the Jedi universe and allows flying through space\, interactive 3D farsight and to top it all the killing of the major baddie in the most inept and inexplicable way possible. 

The use of one of the most loved characters and his subsequent utterly meaningless death is something I am still trying to forget.

I watched Force Awakens three times at the cinema\, I'll never watch Last Jedi again. Ruined the story\, had no real continuity to the saga and left us all with a really bad feeling about it. 

Hell they didn't even say that!!!
